caption: Control multiple accounts in search engines, advertising cabinets and social networks at the same time.
ifDownloadDidntStart: If the download does not start

step1.title: Download and unarchive zip-file.
step1.text: In order to work properly we recommend placing Surfinite App in Applications.

step2.title: Open file
step2.text: to open the file. Otherwise it won't run with double-tap.

step3.title: Confirm Launch
step3.text: Press ”Open” in Verification window. Otherwise, app won't work.

step1.title: Download browser
step1.text: Wait for the download to complete (you may need to click “Save” in a window that pops up).

step2.title: Unarchive folder into desired location
step2.text: We recommend using free 7-Zip arhiver but you can use any other archiver you like.

step3.title: Run as Administrator.
step3.text: If you have “Windows protected your PC” window – just tap “more Info” and “Run anyway”.

step1.title: Download browser
step1.text: Wait for the download to complete (you may need to click “Save” in a window that pops up).

step2.title: Unarchive folder into desired location
step2.text: You can use any other archiver you like.
